itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, March 18, 2013
description: Financial markets overseas are falling sharply today thanks to the unusual terms of a bailout in Cyprus where a tax of up to 10 percent on bank deposits has been proposed to defray the cost of the bailout. The Republican party looks for a new tech guru. And a test of your international business knowledge with our global leadership quiz.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, March 18, 2013
teaser: Financial markets overseas are falling sharply today thanks to the unusual terms of a bailout in Cyprus where a tax of up to 10 percent on bank deposits has been proposed to defray the cost of the bailout. The Republican party looks for a new tech guru. And a test of your international business knowledge with our global leadership quiz.
byline: Tracey Samuelson, David Gura, Karen Clark, Bruce Johnson, Stephan Richter, Katie Long, Sam Beard, Julia Coronado and Jeremy Hobson
